contexts.context: A Shalk and a <mark>kagouti</mark> were strutting back and forth in a foyada, casting aspersions...
..."You are the ugliest creature alive," the Shalk told the <mark>kagouti</mark>. "No, YOU are the ugliest creature alive," the kagouti...
...kagouti. "No, YOU are the ugliest creature alive," the <mark>kagouti</mark> told the Shalk. For each thought himself most handsome,...
It is said that if a <mark>kagouti</mark> steps into a boiling pool, he will leap out immediately...
...will leap out immediately to avoid harm. But if the <mark>kagouti</mark> is standing in a pool, and a wizard slowly raises...
...the temperature, measure by measure, to boiling, the <mark>kagouti</mark> will calmly stand in place until he is boiled. Thus...
